title: Online Language Course Development Using Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies for pre-/in-service teachers to systematically design and develop language education content centered on mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can design an online language course applying the four models of the Integrated Educational Modeling (CEM) methodology: instructional, conceptual, interface, and web modeling.
Learners can develop an online course including a user interface and navigation system optimized for smartphone environments.
Learners can continuously improve content during the PBL process and incorporate peer feedback using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
